sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnserverresrceloginfo ( SERVER_EQPMN_ID /* */ , CPU_USE_RT /* */ , MORY_USE_RT /* */ , SVC_STTUS /* */ , LOG_INFO /* */ , CREAT_DT /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , SERVER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LOG_ID /* */ ) VALUES ( #serverEqpmnId# /* */ , #cpuUseRt# /* */ , #moryUseRt# /* */ , #svcSttus# /* */ , #logInfo# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ , #serverId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #logId# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnserverresrceloginfo SET SERVER_EQPMN_ID=#serverEqpmnId# /* */ , CPU_USE_RT=#cpuUseRt# /* */ , MORY_USE_RT=#moryUseRt# /* */ , SVC_STTUS=#svcSttus# /* */ , LOG_INFO=#logInfo# /* */ , CREAT_DT=#creatDt# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ , SERVER_ID=#serverId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ , LOG_ID=#logId# /* */ WHERE SERVER_EQPMN_ID=#serverEqpmnId# /* */ AND SERVER_ID=#serverId# /* */ AND LOG_ID=#logId# /* */
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnserverresrceloginfo WHERE SERVER_EQPMN_ID=#serverEqpmnId# /* */ AND SERVER_ID=#serverId# /* */ AND LOG_ID=#logId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT SERVER_EQPMN_ID /* */ , CPU_USE_RT /* */ , MORY_USE_RT /* */ , SVC_STTUS /* */ , LOG_INFO /* */ , CREAT_DT /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , SERVER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LOG_ID /* */ FROM comtnserverresrceloginfo WHERE SERVER_EQPMN_ID=#serverEqpmnId# /* */ AND SERVER_ID=#serverId# /* */ AND LOG_ID=#logId# /* */

SELECT SERVER_EQPMN_ID /* */ , CPU_USE_RT /* */ , MORY_USE_RT /* */ , SVC_STTUS /* */ , LOG_INFO /* */ , CREAT_DT /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , SERVER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LOG_ID /* */ FROM comtnserverresrceloginfo WHERE 1=1
SERVER_EQPMN_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
CPU_USE_RT LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY SERVER_EQPMN_ID DESC /* */ , SERVER_ID DESC /* */ , LOG_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnserverresrceloginfo WHERE 1=1
SERVER_EQPMN_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
CPU_USE_RT LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
